structuredData.name: Edit a PDF online
structuredData.description: Workflow for adding text overlays and metadata updates to an existing PDF.

step.name: Upload the PDF
step.text: Rename the file and drag it into the tool. Files up to 20 MB process locally.

step.name: Configure text blocks
step.text: Add one or more blocks, pick the page and placement, then style font size, alignment, and color.

step.name: Update metadata
step.text: Optionally set a new document title and author before exporting.

step.name: Download the edited PDF
step.text: Export the updates and download the refreshed PDF for review or sharing.
